name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: KBAnywhere: Your Knowledge Base, One Click Away

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect, access, and use your knowledge base across the web to streamline customer support and boost your productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take your knowledge base with you, all over the web. Our Chrome extension seamlessly integrates with your Zendesk, HelpCenter.io, or HelpScout knowledge base, putting a wealth of information right at your fingertips, and allowing you to easily reference help articles with the click of a button.

✨ Key Features:

★  Universal Knowledge Access: Whether you're handling customer support requests, trying to recall specific processes, or checking if a topic is covered in your knowledge base, find and retrieve information effortlessly from any webpage.

★ Link to Your Content From Anywhere: Quickly insert links to your help articles anywhere. Writing an email or tackling an important customer support case, linking to your help content has never been easier.

★ "Ask AI": Integrate with OpenAI and get instant answers using the content from your knowledge base. Just ask, and AI will deliver the precise information you need.

★ Bookmark important content from your knowledge base.

★ Seamless Integration: Currently supporting top knowledge base providers:

 - Zendesk
- HelpCenter.io
- HelpScout

★ Integrate with Gmail and utilize AI to automatically write emails with information from your knowledge base.

★ Switch between multiple sources.

Enhance your productivity and efficiency with the ultimate knowledge base browsing tool. Add now and experience the convenience of having all your vital information just a click away.
